node.name: MDTester
node.shortdescription: The MDTester application is a model-driven testing tool that can be used to design tests independently of the target execution platform. It provides a graphical domain-specific language (DSL) for all phases of test engineering from requirements to executable test scripts. The test model can be validated on their consistency and transformed into a test sripting or programming language for execution (JUnit, TTCN-3, PHP, ...). Traceability of test requirements to test cases is ensured. Test documentation can also be generated automatically based on the same test model.
node.body: The MDTester application is a model-driven testing tool that can be used to design tests independently of the target execution platform. It provides a graphical domain-specific language (DSL) for all phases of test engineering from requirements to executable test scripts. The test model can be validated on their consistency and transformed into a test sripting or programming language for execution (JUnit, TTCN-3, PHP, ...). Traceability of test requirements to test cases is ensured. Test documentation can also be generated automatically based on the same test model.
